item.title: Bitget Launches Spot Trading Event, Unlocking 50,000 BGB Airdrop
item.description: On July 23rd, Bitget launched the 1st Trading Club Battle. The trading pairs involved include spot trading, spot instant exchange, spot leverage, and small-scale exchange trading. During this event, users who reach the specified cumulative daily buy-in amount will receive corresponding points. There is no limit to the number of points that can be earned. Users who meet the criteria will have the opportunity to unlock a 24,500 BGB airdrop reward.In addition, the user with the highest cumulative buy-in amount will receive a reward of 500 BGB. Users ranked from 2nd to 501st will unlock a 25,000 BGB prize pool. The trading pairs are limited to BTC, ETH, BGB, SOL, DOGE, and other 5 major currencies. The trading amounts of the top 501 users will be announced on the official form at 11:00 (UTC+8) the day after each event day.The event will take place from July 24th, 00:00:00 to July 30th, 23:59:59 (UTC+8).

item.title: Economists unanimously expect the Federal Reserve to keep rates unchanged in July
item.description: On July 23rd: 105 economists reached a unanimous prediction that the Federal Reserve will maintain the federal funds rate within the range of 4.25%-4.50% on July 30th.

item.title: The EU is preparing a 100 billion Euro contingency plan in case of a no-deal scenario to mitigate the impact of a 30% tariff imposed by the United States.
item.description: On July 23rd, the EU has formulated a contingency plan with a scale of €100 billion in case no agreement is reached to deal with the 30% tariff imposed by the US. (Golden Finance)

item.title: Gate Wallet is launching an ETH 10th Anniversary Double Reward Event
item.description: July 23rd. As per an official announcement, in order to celebrate the tenth anniversary of the Ethereum mainnet, Gate Wallet has launched two user incentive activities:· ETH July Closing Price Guessing Activity: Users are able to submit their predictions of the ETH closing price before 07:58 on August 1st (UTC+8) and make a deposit of ≥10 USDT and conduct an exchange (supporting ETH, BNB, Polygon, AVAX, Arbitrum, and other chains). The top 100 users who are closest to the actual price will have the chance to win a $20 USDT reward each.· The New User Trading Reward Activity is also in progress. From now until August 31st, users who complete deposit and any trading tasks of ETH ecosystem tokens can share a $10,000 USDT prize pool based on their individual trading volume proportions.

item.title: In the last 24 hours, CEX net outflow of 10,442.37 BTC
item.description: On July 23rd, based on Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net outflow of BTC on CEX was 10,442.37 BTC. The top three exchanges with the largest outflows are as follows:Kraken, with an outflow of 9,279.19 BTC;Bybit, with an outflow of 809.39 BTC;OKX, with an outflow of 437.45 BTC.In addition, Bitfinex witnessed an inflow of 407.33 BTC and ranked first on the inflow list.

item.title: Hyperliquid Open Interest Surpasses $14.7 Billion, Setting a New All-Time High
item.description: On July 23rd, Hyperliquid made an official announcement that the open interest in futures contracts on the platform has exceeded $14.7 billion, reaching a new all-time high.

item.title: James Wynn's BTC and PEPE long positions have been partially liquidated, with unrealized losses still exceeding $266,000.
item.description: On July 23rd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a portion of James Wynn's long positions in BTC (with 40x leverage) and PEPE (with 10x leverage) was liquidated. There remains a floating loss of $266,000.

item.title: Hilbert Group Raises $15.8 Million in Funding to Increase Bitcoin Holdings
item.description: On July 23rd, based on the monitoring of @btcNLNico, the Hilbert Group has reached a structured financing agreement worth 1.5 billion Swedish Krona (approximately $15.8 million) with LDA Capital to support its Bitcoin reserve strategy.This "ATM-style" financing mechanism enables the flexible withdrawal of funds over a period of 36 months for Bitcoin accumulation.

item.title: Planet Ventures is planning to raise $5 million CAD through convertible bond financing to increase its Bitcoin holdings
item.description: On July 23rd, according to @btcNLNico, Planet Ventures Inc intends to raise up to 5 million Canadian dollars through convertible debt financing in order to enhance its Bitcoin holdings.

item.title: USDC Treasury Burns 50.07 Million USDC on Ethereum Mainnet
item.description: On July 23rd, as monitored by WhaleAlert, 50.07 million USDC was burned in the USDC Treasury on the Ethereum blockchain.
